title: Diamond Floral Kada - Sparkle of Divinity
materials: Hand-selected Round Brilliant Cut Diamonds (VS Clarity
G-H Color). Features the signature Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: A triple-row Kada featuring delicate floral motifs, each meticulously set with brilliant-cut diamonds. The gold wirework enhances the diamonds' sparkle, creating a timeless design. The delicate setting showcases the brilliance of each diamond individually, offering maximum sparkle and a luxurious feel. Modern design elements are artfully incorporated to create a contemporary take on a classic.
colors: Warm Yellow Gold complemented by the clear
dazzling white of the diamonds. A classic and eternally elegant combination.
occasions: and other special occasions. Also suitable for modern gatherings and formal events. Ideal as a 'Seemantham' gift (Baby shower) or to commemorate milestones.
description: This Diamond Floral Kada represents enduring elegance and superior craftsmanship. The dazzling brilliance of the diamonds, combined with the warmth of yellow gold and Hyderabadi craftsmanship, makes it a truly exceptional piece. Its timeless design ensures it will be treasured for generations. The triple-row design gives it a substantial feel and makes a statement.
